collapsible_basic_content: This is a collapsible content area. Click the trigger above to hide or show this content.
collapsible_section1_content: Content for the first collapsible section.
collapsible_section2_content: Content for the second collapsible section.
collapsible_styled_content: This collapsible has custom styling with accent background and smooth transitions.
accordion_single_item1_content: Yes. It adheres to the WAI-ARIA design pattern.
accordion_multiple_item1_content: An accordion is a vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal a section of content.
accordion_multiple_item2_content: Use accordions to organize related information and reduce the amount of vertical space on the page.
accordion_multiple_item3_content: You can customize the styling, animation, and behavior using props and CSS classes.
accordion_faq_item1_content: Simply import the Accordion components and start building your interface.
accordion_faq_item2_content: Yes, all components are open source and free to use in your projects.
popover_basic_description: Set the dimensions for the layer.
popover_dimensions_description: Set the dimensions for the layer.

hovercard_custom_content: This is additional information that appears when you hover over the trigger element.
